title: Adobe-Reader_10.6.1.apk

Install the free Adobe Reader mobile app to work with PDF documents on your Android tablet or phone. Easily access, manage, and share a wide variety of PDF types, including PDF Portfolios, password-protected documents, fillable forms, and Adobe LiveCycleÃ‚Â® rights-managed PDF.
